contextual_notes: The user is likely seeking cognitive exercises for dementia prevention, possibly for themselves or someone they care for.
The user values detailed and specific information, as seen in their requests for elaboration and specificity.
general_insights: Providing tailored and specific assistance can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Users appreciate detailed explanations and instructions, especially when dealing with complex topics.
Monitoring user feedback and adjusting responses accordingly can maintain or improve satisfaction levels.
